step1.title: Analysis

step2.title: Implementation

klienci.title: Trusted by 50+ companies

testimonial1.quote: ChatBot answers 90% of customer questions. The team has time for sales instead of FAQ.
testimonial1.author: Michał Nowak

testimonial2.quote: VoiceAgent calls leads in 2 minutes. Conversion increased from 5% to 18%.

testimonial3.quote: Content for 500+ products generated automatically. SEO score increased by 40%.

question1.a: From 3000 PLN one-time + from 1500 PLN/month subscription (depending on query volume). You get exact pricing after a 15-min demo call.

question2.a: 7 business days from contract signing to go-live. In urgent cases we can accelerate to 3 days.

question3.a: No. We do everything. All you need is 1-2h for a call + access to systems (CRM, email).

question4.q: What if AI can't handle a question?
question4.a: AI automatically escalates difficult cases to a human. You decide which questions go to AI and which always go to the team.

question5.a: Yes. Servers in EU, full GDPR compliance, data processing agreement. Your data is never used for AI training.
